message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $12,500. I believe this strikes a fair balance between our positions.
